tool_description: Converts ZPL instruction to different format (like PDF)
name: ZPL Converter
title: ZPL Converter

api_list.name: GetAvailableFormats
api_list.description: This method is going to provide you a list which is going to specify which source/destination formats are possible
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zpl-converter.p.rapidapi.com/conversion/formats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zpl-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://zpl-converter.p.rapidapi.com/conversion/formats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
